about_the_game:
Project Faceless is an ultra realistic 4-player, online co-op, psychological horror game built using the latest technologies from Unreal Engine 5. You and your friends must find the papers scattered around the map whilst actively being hunted by the faceless creature. Use your flashlight and communication skills to scour the map to find the papers as the difficulty increasingly rises with each paper found.



The faceless creature will relentlessly pursue you throughout the environment as you collect the necessary papers. As you progress and draw nearer to your objective, the creature's behavior will become increasingly challenging and aggressive. Should the creature locate you and you fail to evade it, you will face certain demise.



Leveraging the advanced technologies of Unreal Engine 5, we have strived to deliver a next-generation gaming experience characterized by stunning graphics and an immersive horror atmosphere. Our goal is to captivate players with visual excellence and heightened suspense, pushing the boundaries of what is possible in modern gaming.

name: Project Faceless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K, AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Super
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-11900, AMD Ryzen 9 5950X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Project Faceless is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game built with Unreal Engine 5. Players locate papers while being hunted by a faceless creature. Use flashlights and teamwork to navigate, with escalating difficulty enhancing the immersive horror experience.
